notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: B.S., J.S.-R., S.C., M.S.-R., M.M. and M.I. wrote the outlines, “Conclusions and Future perspectives”, and “Abstract” sections of the manuscript, and also critically reviewed the entire manuscript. M.V. gathered, organized, and wrote the sections of “Phytochemical Composition of EOs Obtained from Tagetes Genus Plants”. M.F.B.M.-B., J.N.P.C., A.L.A.B.L. and H.D.M.C. gathered, organized, and wrote the “Antimicrobial Ethnomedicine of the Tagetes Genus”, “Antibacterial Activity of Plants from the Tagetes Genus”, “Antifungal Activity of Plants from the Tagetes Genus”, and “Ethnobiology of Tagetes Antimicrobial Activity” sections of the manuscript. S.V. gathered, organized, and wrote the section of “Traditional Medicine Use of Genus Tagetes”. D.K. and H.A. gathered, organized, and wrote the sections of “Food Preservative Applications of Tagetes Genus Plants”, “ Tagetes spp. as Potential Plants in Agriculture”, “ Tagetes spp. as Antimicrobial Agents”, and “ Tagetes spp. as Functional Food Additives”. N.C.C.S. gathered, organized, and wrote the introduction. Z.Y. gathered, organized, and wrote the section “ Tagetes Genus Plant Cultivation”. All authors read and approved the final manuscript, providing important intellectual content.
